accessibility:disableAnimations.name: Disable Animations
accessibility:disableAnimations.description: Turn off all unnecessary animations in the Kibana UI. Refresh the page to apply the changes.

hideAnnouncements.name: Hide announcements
hideAnnouncements.description: Stop showing messages and tours that highlight new features.

dateFormat.name: Date format
dateFormat.description: The format for pretty formatted dates.

dateFormat:scaled.name: Scaled date format
dateFormat:scaled.description: Values that define the format used in situations where time-based data is rendered in order, and formatted timestamps should adapt to the interval between measurements. Keys are ISO8601 intervals.

dateFormat:dow.name: Day of week
dateFormat:dow.description: The day that starts the week.

dateNanosFormat.name: Date with nanoseconds format
dateNanosFormat.description: The format for date_nanos data.

defaultRoute.name: Default route
defaultRoute.description: This setting specifies the default route when opening Kibana. You can use this setting to modify the landing page when opening Kibana. The route must be a relative URL.

notifications:banner.name: Custom banner notification
notifications:banner.description: A custom banner intended for temporary notices to all users. Markdown supported.

notifications:lifetime:banner.name: Banner notification lifetime
notifications:lifetime:banner.description: The time in milliseconds which a banner notification will be displayed on-screen for.

notifications:lifetime:error.name: Error notification lifetime
notifications:lifetime:error.description: The time in milliseconds which an error notification will be displayed on-screen for.

notifications:lifetime:warning.name: Warning notification lifetime
notifications:lifetime:warning.description: The time in milliseconds which a warning notification will be displayed on-screen for.

notifications:lifetime:info.name: Info notification lifetime
notifications:lifetime:info.description: The time in milliseconds which an information notification will be displayed on-screen for.

theme:darkMode.name: Dark mode
theme:darkMode.description: Enable a dark mode for the Kibana UI. A page refresh is required for the setting to be applied.

state:storeInSessionStorage.name: Store URLs in session storage
state:storeInSessionStorage.description: The URL can sometimes grow to be too large for some browsers to handle. To counter-act this we are testing if storing parts of the URL in session storage could help. Please let us know how it goes!

csv:separator.name: CSV separator
csv:separator.description: Separate exported values with this string

csv:quoteValues.name: Quote CSV values
csv:quoteValues.description: Should values be quoted in csv exports?

banners:placement.name: Banner placement
banners:placement.description: Display a top banner above the Elastic header. Subscription required.

banners:textContent.name: Banner text
banners:textContent.description: Add Markdown-formatted text to the banner. Subscription required.

banners:textColor.name: Banner text color
banners:textColor.description: Set the color of the banner text. Subscription required.

banners:backgroundColor.name: Banner background color
banners:backgroundColor.description: Set the background color for the banner. Subscription required.

savedObjects:perPage.name: Objects per page
savedObjects:perPage.description: Number of objects to show per page in the load dialog

savedObjects:listingLimit.name: Objects listing limit
savedObjects:listingLimit.description: Number of objects to fetch for the listing pages

shortDots:enable.name: Shorten fields
shortDots:enable.description: Shorten long fields, for example, instead of foo.bar.baz, show f.b.baz

format:defaultTypeMap.name: Field type format name
format:defaultTypeMap.description: Map of the format name to use by default for each field type. "_default_" is used if the field type is not mentioned explicitly

format:number:defaultPattern.name: Number format
format:number:defaultPattern.description: Default numeral format for the "number" format

format:percent:defaultPattern.name: Percent format
format:percent:defaultPattern.description: Default numeral format for the "percent" format

format:bytes:defaultPattern.name: Bytes format
format:bytes:defaultPattern.description: Default numeral format for the "bytes" format

format:currency:defaultPattern.name: Currency format
format:currency:defaultPattern.description: Default numeral format for the "currency" format

visualization:colorMapping.name: Color mapping
visualization:colorMapping.description: Maps values to specific colors in charts using the Compatibility palette.

deprecation.message: This setting is deprecated and will not be supported in a future version.

visualization:useLegacyTimeAxis.name: Legacy chart time axis
visualization:useLegacyTimeAxis.description: Enables the legacy time axis for charts in Lens, Discover, Visualize and TSVB

deprecation.message: This setting is deprecated and will not be supported in a future version.

bfetch:disable.name: Disable request batching
bfetch:disable.description: Disables requests batching. This increases number of HTTP requests from Kibana, but allows to debug requests individually.

bfetch:disableCompression.name: Disable batch compression
bfetch:disableCompression.description: Disable batch compression. This allows you to debug individual requests, but increases response size.

metaFields.name: Meta fields
metaFields.description: Fields that exist outside of _source to merge into our document when displaying it

doc_table:highlight.name: Highlight results
doc_table:highlight.description: Highlight results in Discover and Saved Searches Dashboard. Highlighting makes requests slow when working on big documents.

query:queryString:options.name: Query string options
query:queryString:options.description: Options for the lucene query string parser. Is only used when "Query language" is set to Lucene.

query:allowLeadingWildcards.name: Allow leading wildcards in query
query:allowLeadingWildcards.description: When set, * is allowed as the first character in a query clause. To disallow leading wildcards in basic lucene queries, use query:queryString:options.

search:queryLanguage.name: Query language
search:queryLanguage.description: Query language used by the query bar. KQL is a new language built specifically for Kibana.

sort:options.name: Sort options
sort:options.description: Options for the Elasticsearch sort parameter

defaultIndex.name: Default data view
defaultIndex.description: Used by discover and visualizations when a data view is not set.

courier:ignoreFilterIfFieldNotInIndex.name: Ignore filter(s)
courier:ignoreFilterIfFieldNotInIndex.description: This configuration enhances support for dashboards containing visualizations accessing dissimilar indexes. When disabled, all filters are applied to all visualizations. When enabled, filter(s) will be ignored for a visualization when the visualization's index does not contain the filtering field.

courier:setRequestPreference.name: Request preference
courier:setRequestPreference.description:
Allows you to set which shards handle your search requests.
  • Session ID: restricts operations to execute all search requests on the same shards. This has the benefit of reusing shard caches across requests.
  • Custom: allows you to define a your own preference. Use 'courier:customRequestPreference' to customize your preference value.
  • None: means do not set a preference. This might provide better performance because requests can be spread across all shard copies. However, results might be inconsistent because different shards might be in different refresh states.

courier:customRequestPreference.name: Custom request preference
courier:customRequestPreference.description: Request Preference used when courier:setRequestPreference is set to "custom".

courier:maxConcurrentShardRequests.name: Max Concurrent Shard Requests
courier:maxConcurrentShardRequests.description: Controls the max_concurrent_shard_requests setting used for _msearch requests sent by Kibana. Set to 0 to disable this config and use the Elasticsearch default.

search:includeFrozen.name: Search in frozen indices
search:includeFrozen.description: Will include frozen indices in results if enabled. Searching through frozen indices might increase the search time.

deprecation.message: This setting is deprecated and will be removed in Kibana 9.0.

histogram:barTarget.name: Target buckets
histogram:barTarget.description: Attempt to generate around this many buckets when using "auto" interval in date and numeric histograms

histogram:maxBars.name: Maximum buckets
histogram:maxBars.description:
Limits the density of date and number histograms across Kibana
          for better performance using a test query. If the test query would too many buckets,
          the interval between buckets will be increased. This setting applies separately
          to each histogram aggregation, and does not apply to other types of aggregation.
          To find the maximum value of this setting, divide the Elasticsearch 'search.max_buckets'
          value by the maximum number of aggregations in each visualization.

history:limit.name: History limit
history:limit.description: In fields that have history (e.g. query inputs), show this many recent values

timepicker:refreshIntervalDefaults.name: Time filter refresh interval
timepicker:refreshIntervalDefaults.description: The timefilter's default refresh interval. The "value" needs to be specified in milliseconds.

timepicker:timeDefaults.name: Time filter defaults
timepicker:timeDefaults.description: The timefilter selection to use when Kibana is started without one. Must be an object containing "from" and "to" (see accepted formats).

timepicker:quickRanges.name: Time filter quick ranges
timepicker:quickRanges.description: The list of ranges to show in the Quick section of the time filter. This should be an array of objects, with each object containing "from", "to" (see accepted formats), and "display" (the title to be displayed).

filters:pinnedByDefault.name: Pin filters by default
filters:pinnedByDefault.description: Whether the filters should have a global state (be pinned) by default

filterEditor:suggestValues.name: Filter editor suggest values
filterEditor:suggestValues.description: Set this property to false to prevent the filter editor from suggesting values for fields.

autocomplete:valueSuggestionMethod.name: Autocomplete value suggestion method
autocomplete:valueSuggestionMethod.description: The method used for querying suggestions for values in KQL autocomplete. Select terms_enum to use the Elasticsearch terms enum API for improved autocomplete suggestion performance. (Note that terms_enum is incompatible with Document Level Security.) Select terms_agg to use an Elasticsearch terms aggregation. (Note that terms_agg is incompatible with IP-type fields.) Learn more.

autocomplete:useTimeRange.name: Use time range
autocomplete:useTimeRange.description: Disable this property to get autocomplete suggestions from your full dataset, rather than from the current time range. Learn more.

search:timeout.name: Search Timeout
search:timeout.description: Change the maximum timeout for a search session or set to 0 to disable the timeout and allow queries to run to completion.

fileUpload:maxFileSize.name: Maximum file upload size
fileUpload:maxFileSize.description: Sets the file size limit when importing files. The highest supported value for this setting is 1GB.

labs:dashboard:deferBelowFold.name: Defer loading panels below "the fold"
labs:dashboard:deferBelowFold.description: Any panels below "the fold"-- the area hidden beyond the bottom of the window, accessed by scrolling-- will not be loaded immediately, but only when they enter the viewport

labs:dashboard:dashboardControls.name: Enable dashboard controls
labs:dashboard:dashboardControls.description: Enables the controls system for dashboard, which allows dashboard authors to more easily build interactive elements for their users.

labs:canvas:byValueEmbeddable.name: By-Value Embeddables
labs:canvas:byValueEmbeddable.description: Enables support for by-value embeddables in Canvas

visualization:heatmap:maxBuckets.name: Heatmap maximum buckets
visualization:heatmap:maxBuckets.description: The maximum number of buckets a single datasource can return. A higher number might have negative impact on browser rendering performance

metrics:max_buckets.name: TSVB buckets limit
metrics:max_buckets.description: Affects the TSVB histogram density. Must be set higher than "histogram:maxBars".

metrics:allowStringIndices.name: Allow string indices in TSVB
metrics:allowStringIndices.description: Enables you to query Elasticsearch indices in TSVB visualizations.

metrics:allowCheckingForFailedShards.name: Show TSVB request shard failures
metrics:allowCheckingForFailedShards.description: Show warning message for partial data in TSVB charts if the request succeeds for some shards but fails for others.

timelion:es.timefield.name: Time field
timelion:es.timefield.description: Default field containing a timestamp when using .es()

timelion:es.default_index.name: Default index
timelion:es.default_index.description: Default elasticsearch index to search with .es()

timelion:target_buckets.name: Target buckets
timelion:target_buckets.description: The number of buckets to shoot for when using auto intervals

timelion:max_buckets.name: Maximum buckets
timelion:max_buckets.description: The maximum number of buckets a single datasource can return

timelion:min_interval.name: Minimum interval
timelion:min_interval.description: The smallest interval that will be calculated when using "auto"

visualization:visualize:legacyHeatmapCha.name: Heatmap legacy charts library
visualization:visualize:legacyHeatmapCha.description: Enables legacy charts library for heatmap charts in visualize.

deprecation.message: The legacy charts library for heatmap in visualize is deprecated and will not be supported in a future version.

labs:dashboard:enable_ui.name: Enable labs button in Dashboard
labs:dashboard:enable_ui.description: This flag determines if the viewer has access to the Labs button, a quick way to enable and disable technical preview features in Dashboard.

defaultColumns.name: Default columns
defaultColumns.description: Columns displayed by default in the Discover app. If empty, a summary of the document will be displayed.

discover:maxDocFieldsDisplayed.name: Maximum document fields displayed
discover:maxDocFieldsDisplayed.description: Maximum number of fields rendered in the document summary

discover:sampleSize.name: Maximum rows per table
discover:sampleSize.description: Sets the maximum number of rows for the entire document table.

discover:sampleRowsPerPage.name: Rows per page
discover:sampleRowsPerPage.description: Limits the number of rows per page in the document table.

discover:sort:defaultOrder.name: Default sort direction
discover:sort:defaultOrder.description: Controls the default sort direction for time based data views in the Discover app.

discover:searchOnPageLoad.name: Search on page load
discover:searchOnPageLoad.description: Controls whether a search is executed when Discover first loads. This setting does not have an effect when loading a saved search.

doc_table:hideTimeColumn.name: Hide 'Time' column
doc_table:hideTimeColumn.description: Hide the 'Time' column in Discover and in all Saved Searches on Dashboards.

fields:popularLimit.name: Popular fields limit
fields:popularLimit.description: The top N most popular fields to show

context:defaultSize.name: Context size
context:defaultSize.description: The number of surrounding entries to show in the context view

context:step.name: Context size step
context:step.description: The step size to increment or decrement the context size by

context:tieBreakerFields.name: Tie breaker fields
context:tieBreakerFields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to use for tie-breaking between documents that have the same timestamp value. From this list the first field that is present and sortable in the current data view is used.

doc_table:legacy.name: Document Explorer or classic view
doc_table:legacy.description: To use the new Document Explorer instead of the classic view, turn off this option. The Document Explorer offers better data sorting, resizable columns, and a full screen view.

discover:modifyColumnsOnSwitch.name: Modify columns when changing data views
discover:modifyColumnsOnSwitch.description: Remove columns that are not available in the new data view.

discover:searchFieldsFromSource.name: Read fields from _source
discover:searchFieldsFromSource.description: When enabled will load documents directly from `_source`. This is soon going to be deprecated. When disabled, will retrieve fields via the new Fields API in the high-level search service.

discover:showFieldStatistics.name: Show field statistics
discover:showFieldStatistics.description: Enable the Field statistics view to show details such as the minimum and maximum values of a numeric field or a map of a geo field. This functionality is in beta and is subject to change.

discover:showMultiFields.name: Show multi-fields
discover:showMultiFields.description: Controls whether multi-fields display in the expanded document view. In most cases, multi-fields are the same as the original field. This option is only available when `searchFieldsFromSource` is off.

discover:rowHeightOption.name: Row height in the Document Explorer
discover:rowHeightOption.description: The number of lines to allow in a row. A value of -1 automatically adjusts the row height to fit the contents. A value of 0 displays the content in a single line.

truncate:maxHeight.name: Maximum cell height in the classic table
truncate:maxHeight.description: The maximum height that a cell in a table should occupy. Set to 0 to disable truncation.

discover:enableESQL.name: Enable ES|QL
discover:enableESQL.description: [technical preview] This tech preview feature is highly experimental--do not rely on this for production saved searches, visualizations or dashboards. This setting enables ES|QL in Discover. If you have feedback on this experience please reach out to us on discuss.elastic.co/c/elastic-stack/kibana

xpackReporting:customPdfLogo.name: PDF footer image
xpackReporting:customPdfLogo.description: Custom image to use in the PDF's footer

labs:canvas:enable_ui.name: Enable labs button in Canvas
labs:canvas:enable_ui.description: This flag determines if the viewer has access to the Labs button, a quick way to enable and disable technical preview features in Canvas.

rollups:enableIndexPatterns.name: Enable rollup data views
rollups:enableIndexPatterns.description:
Enable the creation of data views that capture rollup indices,
              which in turn enable visualizations based on rollup data.

observability:enableInspectEsQueries.name: Inspect ES queries
observability:enableInspectEsQueries.description: Inspect Elasticsearch queries in API responses.

observability:maxSuggestions.name: Maximum suggestions
observability:maxSuggestions.description: Maximum number of suggestions fetched in autocomplete selection boxes.

observability:enableComparisonByDefault.name: Comparison feature
observability:enableComparisonByDefault.description: Determines whether the comparison feature is enabled or disabled by default in the APM app.

observability:apmDefaultServiceEnvironme.name: Default service environment
observability:apmDefaultServiceEnvironme.description: Set the default environment for the APM app. When left empty, data from all environments will be displayed by default.

observability:apmProgressiveLoading.name: Use progressive loading of selected APM views
observability:apmProgressiveLoading.description: [technical preview] Whether to load data progressively for APM views. Data may be requested with a lower sampling rate first, with lower accuracy but faster response times, while the unsampled data loads in the background

observability:apmServiceInventoryOptimiz.name: Optimize services list load performance in APM
observability:apmServiceInventoryOptimiz.description: [technical preview] Default APM Service Inventory and Storage Explorer pages sort (for Services without Machine Learning applied) to sort by Service Name.

observability:apmServiceGroupMaxNumberOf.name: Maximum services in a service group
observability:apmServiceGroupMaxNumberOf.description: Limit the number of services in a given service group

observability:apmTraceExplorerTab.name: APM Trace Explorer
observability:apmTraceExplorerTab.description: [technical preview] Enable the APM Trace Explorer feature, that allows you to search and inspect traces with KQL or EQL. Learn more.

observability:apmLabsButton.name: Enable labs button in APM
observability:apmLabsButton.description: This flag determines if the viewer has access to the Labs button, a quick way to enable and disable technical preview features in APM.

observability:enableInfrastructureHostsV.name: Infrastructure Hosts view
observability:enableInfrastructureHostsV.description: [beta] Enable the Hosts view in the Infrastructure app.

observability:enableAwsLambdaMetrics.name: AWS Lambda Metrics
observability:enableAwsLambdaMetrics.description: [technical preview] Display Amazon Lambda metrics in the service metrics tab.

observability:apmEnableServiceMetrics.name: Service transaction metrics
observability:apmEnableServiceMetrics.description: [beta] Enables the usage of service transaction metrics, which are low cardinality metrics that can be used by certain views like the service inventory for faster loading times.

observability:apmEnableContinuousRollups.name: Continuous rollups
observability:apmEnableContinuousRollups.description: [beta] When continuous rollups is enabled, the UI will select metrics with the appropriate resolution. On larger time ranges, lower resolution metrics will be used, which will improve loading times.

observability:apmEnableCriticalPath.name: Critical path
observability:apmEnableCriticalPath.description: [technical preview] Optionally display the critical path of a trace.

observability:syntheticsThrottlingEnable.name: Enable Synthetics throttling (Experimental)
observability:syntheticsThrottlingEnable.description: Enable the throttling setting in Synthetics monitor configurations. Note that throttling may still not be available for your monitors even if the setting is active. Intended for internal use only. read notice here.

observability:enableLegacyUptimeApp.name: Always show legacy Uptime app
observability:enableLegacyUptimeApp.description: By default, the legacy Uptime app is hidden from the interface when it doesn't have any data for more than a week. Enable this option to always show it.

observability:apmEnableProfilingIntegrat.name: Enable Universal Profiling integration in APM

ml:anomalyDetection:results:enableTimeDe.name: Enable time filter defaults for anomaly detection results
ml:anomalyDetection:results:enableTimeDe.description: Use the default time filter in the Single Metric Viewer and Anomaly Explorer. If not enabled, the results for the full time range of the job are displayed.

ml:anomalyDetection:results:timeDefaults.name: Time filter defaults for anomaly detection results
ml:anomalyDetection:results:timeDefaults.description: The time filter selection to use when viewing anomaly detection job results.

securitySolution:refreshIntervalDefaults.name: Time filter refresh interval
securitySolution:refreshIntervalDefaults.description: Default refresh interval for the Security time filter, in milliseconds.

securitySolution:timeDefaults.name: Time filter period
securitySolution:timeDefaults.description: Default period of time in the Security time filter.

securitySolution:defaultIndex.name: Elasticsearch indices
securitySolution:defaultIndex.description: Comma-delimited list of Elasticsearch indices from which the Security app collects events.

securitySolution:defaultThreatIndex.name: Threat indices
securitySolution:defaultThreatIndex.description: Comma-delimited list of Threat Intelligence indices from which the Security app collects indicators.

securitySolution:defaultAnomalyScore.name: Anomaly threshold
securitySolution:defaultAnomalyScore.description:
Value above which Machine Learning job anomalies are displayed in the Security app.

Valid values: 0 to 100.

securitySolution:rulesTableRefresh.name: Rules auto refresh
securitySolution:rulesTableRefresh.description: Enables auto refresh on the rules and monitoring tables, in milliseconds

securitySolution:newsFeedUrl.name: News feed URL
securitySolution:newsFeedUrl.description: News feed content will be retrieved from this URL

securitySolution:ipReputationLinks.name: IP Reputation Links
securitySolution:ipReputationLinks.description: Array of URL templates to build the list of reputation URLs to be displayed on the IP Details page.

securitySolution:enableCcsWarning.name: CCS Rule Privileges Warning
securitySolution:enableCcsWarning.description: Enables privilege check warnings in rules for CCS indices

securitySolution:showRelatedIntegrations.name: Related integrations
securitySolution:showRelatedIntegrations.description: Shows related integrations on the rules and monitoring tables

securitySolution:alertTags.name: Alert tagging options
securitySolution:alertTags.description: List of tag options for use with alerts generated by Security Solution rules.

visualization:visualize:legacyGaugeChart.name: Gauge legacy charts library
visualization:visualize:legacyGaugeChart.description: Enables legacy charts library for gauge charts in visualize.
